t: Amazon.com : PENN Battle III Spinning Fishing Reel : Sports & Outdoors
s: Battle II spinning reels have Penn's HT-100 Versa-Drag washers keyed into the spool which allows both sides of each drag washer to be used. This gives the Battle II higher max drags, more range, and smoother start ups than the competition.

t: Amazon.com : Penn Battle II Spinning Fishing Reel : Sports & Outdoors
s: Eventually it will seize and stop working, regardless of how well you clean it. Would not recommend this reel for any type of fishing. Penn wanted $35 for parts, plus labor and I had to pay for shipping. Had the reel for less than a year when it broke. Looking at another brand for my next surf reel.

t: Amazon.com: PENN Battle III Spinning Fishing Reel
s: I own TWO Penn Battle 2 reels. I also own many Shimano's. Do yourself a favor and buy Shimano. These Battles are STICKY. They don't turn well at all and almost every time i use mine they get put down for stickiness. ANY Shimano in this price range is a WAY batter purchase.
